verses.verse: "My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2254>consumed.<s%> My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinct,<s%> And the grave is ready for <S%H6913>me.<s%>
Surely there are <S%H2049>mockers<s%> with <S%H5869>me.<s%> My eye <S%H3885>dwells<s%> on their <S%H4784>provocation.<s%>
"Now <S%H7760>give<s%> a <S%H6148>pledge,<s%> be collateral for me with <S%H8628>yourself.<s%> Who is there who will strike hands with <S%H3027>me?<s%>
For you have <S%H6845>hidden<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7922>understanding,<s%> Therefore you shall not exalt <S%H7311>them.<s%>
He who <S%H5046>denounces<s%> his <S%H7453>friends<s%> for a <S%H2506>prey,<s%> Even the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%>
"But he has <S%H3322>made<s%> me a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H6440>They<s%> spit in my <S%H8611>face.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> also is <S%H3543>dim<s%> by reason of <S%H3708>sorrow.<s%> All my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>
<S%H3477>Upright<s%> men shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H5355>this.<s%> The innocent shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> himself against the <S%H2611>godless.<s%>
Yet shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on his <S%H1870>way.<s%> He who has <S%H2890>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H3254>grow<s%> stronger and <S%H555>stronger.<s%>
<S%H199>But<s%> as for you <S%H7725>all,<s%> come on <S%H935>now<s%> <S%H4672>again;<s%> I shall not find a wise man among <S%H2450>you.<s%>
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past,<s%> my <S%H2154>plans<s%> are broken <S%H5423>off,<s%> as are the <S%H4180>thoughts<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
They <S%H7760>change<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> into <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H216>saying<s%> 'The light is <S%H7138>near<s%>' in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
If I <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> as my <S%H1004>house,<s%> if I have <S%H7502>spread<s%> my <S%H3326>couch<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%>
If I have <S%H7121>said<s%> to <S%H7845>corruption,<s%> <S%H1><s%> 'You are my father;' to the <S%H7415>worm,<s%> <S%H517><s%> 'My mother,' <S%H269>and<s%> 'my sister;'
where then <S%H645>is<s%> my <S%H8615>hope?<s%> as for my <S%H8615>hope,<s%> who shall see <S%H7789>it?<s%>
Shall it go <S%H3381>down<s%> with me to the <S%H905>gates<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> or <S%H5183>descend<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> into the <S%H6083>dust?<s%>"
